short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple and accurate Multichain gas price tracker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔥 Get accurate gas price predictions for 20+ different networks with a click!

🦉 Owlracle is the best multichain gas price tracker. Have all gas-related information in the convenience of an extension.

Extension features:
⛽ Current Gas Price: Check the current gas price for 20+ networks. You can choose and save your speed settings and your choice of transaction for a tailored information.
📈 Gas Price History: A convenient chart showing gas price, gas fee and token price for your derired time-frame.
🔮 Tx Advisor: Get Owlracle gas price recommendations right into your Metamask transaction confirmation window! You do not have to input custom gas price ever again. Let we handle this for you.

Owlracle is free and open-source.

🤖 We also provide a powerful and highly customizable REST API to help developers retrieve gas price and gas history information best suited to their app needs.

🦉 Visit our website https://owlracle.info for more info.


⚠️ Please read our policies below:⚠️

* We do not store any of your personal data.
* The extension store your preferences such as chosen network and last tab on local storage. None of this is transmitted to our server.
* The extension also stores your logged API key on local storage. You use it every time you ask for gas information from our servers.
* When using the Tx Advisor, the extension has access to the active tab, just as Metamask, AdBlock, and many other extensions do.
* To do its thing, Tx Advisor needs to have access to a global variable set and read by Metamask (window.ethereum). This is the only reason for the active tab permission. No other info about your tab is captured or recorded.
* Our code is open-source. You can always check it at https://github.com/owlracle/extension, or ask us anything on our Discord server at https://owlracle.info/discord-general

🛠️ Patch Notes 

🔹Version 1.3

🔸Added automatic support for all chains supported on the website.
🔸Changed visua style for dropdown menus.
🔸Now gas section shows maxFee, priorityFee and baseFee for eip1559 networks.
🔸Added Customize Fee feature, allowing to pick common transactions to show you accurate fees in USD.
🔸Added Customize Speeds feature, allowing to pick custom accept value for each of the four gas cards.

🔹Version 1.2.0.3

🔸Tx advisor fee is set to FREE until further notice.
🔸Removed cookies permission.
🔸Added a permission and privacy policies information.

🔹Version 1.2

🔸Added a new tab for tx advisor: a new feature enabling Owlracle Extension to override the gas price settings set by protocols right into your Metamaks interface.
